cash

Class Cash

  • java.lang.Object
    • cash.Cash

  • public class Cash
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects of the Cash class represent amounts of Australian money.The class has two fields of type int for the dollars and cents in the amount of money as well as several methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cash(int cashDollars, int cashCents)
      the constructor of class Cash with two arguments

      a second version for addition, use a calling object and a single argument, the result is given as the changed value of the calling object

      add method for the addition of amounts of money(have two arguments of type Cash and return a value of type Cash)
      void display()
      display the value of dollars and cents
      boolean equals(Cash cash)
      equals method is to compares if the value of dollars and cents in both objects are the same and returns a boolean (take an argument of type Cash)

      getter method to get the value of field cashCents in Cash class
